subject: feat: migrate to Vite with vite-plugin-pwa
body:
Replace manual PWA setup with vite-plugin-pwa for proper offline support.

Changes:
- Add Vite as build tool (npm run dev/build/preview)
- Add vite-plugin-pwa with Workbox for service worker generation
- Configure runtime caching for CDN assets (Tailwind, Chart.js, fonts)
- Update GitHub Actions to build with Vite before deploying
- Remove manual sw.js and manifest.json (now auto-generated)
- Add dashboard/public/icons/ for static asset copying

Development:
- npm run dev: Start dev server with hot reload
- npm run build: Production build to dist/
- npm run preview: Preview production build
